{"id":868568628,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1672493728,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/868568628/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        int i = 0;\n        int ans;\n        int num = 0;\n        bool isNegDivid = false;\n        bool isNegDivis = false;\n        \n\n        if(divisor == INT_MIN) return 0;\n        if(divisor == -1 && dividend == INT_MIN) return INT_MAX;\n        if(dividend == INT_MIN){\n            if(divisor < 0){\n                while(num - INT_MIN >= abs(divisor)){\n                    num += divisor;\n                    i++;\n                }\n                ans = i;\n            }\n            else{\n                while((-num) - INT_MIN >= abs(divisor)){\n                    num -= divisor;\n                    i++;\n                }\n                ans = -i;\n            }\n        }\n        else{\n            if(dividend < 0){\n                isNegDivid = true;\n                dividend = -dividend;\n            }\n\n            if(divisor < 0){\n                isNegDivis = true;\n                divisor = -divisor;\n            }\n            while(INT_MAX - num >= divisor && dividend - num >= divisor){\n                num += divisor;\n                i++;\n            }\n            if(isNegDivid^isNegDivis) i = -i;\n            ans = i;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
